pr_title: Prevent x of step to be undefined (NaN) during CGMES import for non tabular ptc

timeline.message:
Prevent x of step to be undefined (NaN) during CGMES import for non tabular ptc

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

timeline.bodyText: I think the problem is that the X of the transformer is zero. We should not allow transformers with zero reactance. I think is better to fix this problem in the class CgmesT2xModel (Line 35) for twoWindingsTransformer and in the class CgmesT3xModel (Line 43) for threeWindingsTransformers. We can write an invalid warning and fix the X to a residual value (0.0001 by example) or maybe we can throw an exception.
timeline.author: marqueslanauja

replies.bodyText: Is it okay for you to put Double.MIN_VALUE? I would rather correct the value than throw an exception (the validation can be modified in another PR)
replies.author: miovd

replies.bodyText: For clarification, I ran into this exception with alphaMax equals to 0.
